The retuns process is also disappointing it says I there is no collect from home option but the courier listed delivers to me from NEXT all the time and I presume delivered the parcel to my address.  So unlikely to order again if I have to drive to a collection vpoint 4 miles away I can't understand why it can't go back the way it came.

Text: I had a voucher so at first I ordered a pair of Kawasakis which weren't as good quality as I thought they were going to be so I sent them back. So then  I ordered a pair of Marathons in 10 1/2, I usually wear 10 to 10 1/2. They didn't have any in bigger sizes at Zalando. They sent me a pair of 10s, which are more like 8 1/2 in the manufacturers sizing. So they got sent back and I got my money back again. Then they were back in stock in 11 1/2 but Zalando said in the e-mail it could take a bit longer because of technical issues. A couple of days later the childs sizes were back in stock. Then a couple of weeks later the 11 1/2s were back online and I ordered them straight away and got them 4 days later, this time in the right size. The shoes look better than in the pictures and are really nice to wear, I could imagine you could wear them clubbing. They're great to wear and feel much better after being worn in

Text: This is my second pair of Lowa Renegade boots and I find them to be far and away the most comfortable boots I have ever owned, straight out of the box, and I wear them all day every day!

Text: This is my 4th pair of Lowa renegades in 12 years. That makes them relatively cheap to buy, since they last so long without wearing out. I do wear them pretty much 24/7 too, so that says something for the longivity of them. The fact that they also come in half sizes is also a godsend as I am a size 9 and a half and getting boots that fit properly is usually a nihgtmare. Well it was until I got my first pair of renegades. They are so comfortable staight out of the box and in my opinion need very little or no breaking in, unlike some other brands. By a pair, you really will not regret it.
Title: The best walking boots I have ever owned

Text:
Very happy with the product and time it took to get to us, but when delivered, no knock on the door, so we did not get the item  handed-over, or signed for, it was just left in the porchway, with the front door slightly ajar!! Only when next door walked past, and let us know that our door was open and a large parcel was on the floor, did we know of its existence.
     Is this "normal delivery practice"?? as "anyone" could have reached in, off the pavement, and taken the goods, without us knowing, as we have an "inner porch doorway.

Text:
i really liked the shape of these on the page and loved the floral design - i was looking for clogs at the time!  They looked to be a good width and had adjustable sling-backs.  i ordered a 42 to allow for the width and figured with the sabot-style toe, they could fit the bill.  i had the additional safety net of being able to return them if they proved unwearable - and at these prices they need to be perfect, so it's a good feature!
They arrived very quickly and i was delighted to find they were a really good quality shoe.
The width fit beautifully.  They had a smooth finish and were very comfortable from the first try-on.  They were a fraction long but not a 'biggy'.  i did decided to try my real size 41 and see if they were as good.   To my further delight, they are - like i said, at these prices, you really need to be totally happy with them.  i ordered some sandals with the first pair, but they weren't quite right and returned them for a refund.  This was done quickly and efficiently - 10 out of 10 all round.
Title: Super sabot-style shoes

Text: I ordered what  was given as a size 13.5uk on the website. I received size 12uk. Text:
I guess the title says it all :) This is my first experience of internet shopping and Zalando did not dissapoint! The shoes look very smart on wearing and are extremely comfortable and snug on the feet. I did, however, have to return the ones I'd ordered initially since they were small for the usual size 38 that I wear. But the return and re-delivery process went very smoothly - Zalando was very efficient about tracking/returning the product and debiting the amount. 

One request: If there could be the option of having a time of delivery stated in the form it would help working people like me, so that we can personally be available to collect.

Text:
These might be ok if they were the item described but they're listed as MENS BRIEFS but the item that ships is LADIES BRIEFS. When I'm buying a '3D fitted' pair of underwear at £19 per pair I really do expect them to be for the gender I ordered.
After my order for 1 item arrived and I reported the problem I was offered a discount so ordered additional items and asked for the stock to be checked to confirm it was the item listed. 
Now the replacement items have arrived with the same fault...
Come on Zalando - if you can't even manage to differentiate men and womens pants you shouldn't be trying to sell them!

Text: Firstly, this coat is delightfully warm. It is quite long so is good for cold winters and as a bonus the zip can undo from the bottom  so you can sit comfortably without placing strain on the fabric. You definetely need to order a size larger than normal if you intend to wear winter clothes under it, otherwise you will find it quite restrictive. I am pleased with the appearance though the outer fabric looks quite fragile and I wonder how long it will be before it tears around the poppers. The hood stays up quite well and is fairly comfortable around your neck even with the poppers done up. A good everyday winter coat.
Title: Winter warmth

This is a lovely well made warm winter coat, however the sizing is way out I would say.

Text: After placing the order on 20 November I still haven't received them. I watched YODEL receive it in Oxford and then taken days to transport them to Borehamwood where they have been since the weekend and now there is a delay in transit from there.  In this day and age other companies are managing much quicker delivery times and this is an example where I am not going to get a chance to be satisfied by the service, never mind delighted.  We are well outside the delivery commitment you promise on the website. Very frustrating. My stars are chosen randomly as I wouldn't have any idea at the moment whether they do fit!

Text: If the item ever turns up I'll review it, it says 3-5 working days on the Zalando website, now 6 working days and no shoes, I called Yodel the despatch company and had to hold for 10 minutes before speaking to someone, they told me it would be delivered tomorrow between 9am and 5pm, that's 7 working days, the shoes are a birthday present and the birthday is tomorrow so I won't have them in time, and if they're wrong I'm in serious trouble, highly unimpressive service but I will say they were extremely efficient in taking my money.

Text: Really comfortable, warm and look great on!  Zalando has been easy to buy from will use the site again.
Title: Love these!

Text: These are a top quality boot that last for years - bombproof. They are reasonably waterproof but will get saturated if in extreme weather all day. They are brilliant at keeping your feet warm though. I've used mine down to minus 7 with just one pair of socks and they kept my feet toasty warm - which is a welcome change from my standard bike shoes and much better than the feedback that I get from others using other winter boots. The Boa lacing is also good too as it provides uniform support and is very easy and quick to operate - even with cold hands. Be careful with the sizing though. I'm normally a 43 but had to buy a 45.5. They are also quite a narrow fit. If  you want the best, buy these boots.
Title: Best winter cycling boots

Text:
Having always had "cheapy" Ugg-style boots, I thought I'd splash out and buy myself a pair of these EMU boots.  They looked good when I took them out of the box, and I expected them to be as comfortable as my "cheapy" boots but sadly they were not.  They are too small - I bought my normal shoe size, as I did for my "cheapy" boots - and my toes are right at the end of the boot, very uncomfortable.  But I know if I buy the next size up they will be too big.  Additionally I could feel the back of the heel, where there's a kind of reinforced heel piece, digging in to the back of my heel, around my Achilles tendon, which I know would cause blisters if I wore them for any length of time.  

All in all, I am very disappointed - these are nowhere near as comfortable as my "cheapy" boots, and I've returned them for a refund.
Title: Not at all comfortable

Text: I BOUGHT THIS ON-LINE A MONTH OR SO AGO AFTER READING THE RAVE REVIEWS, BEING VERY TALL MYSELF I WAS PLEASED SOME REVIEWS STATED HOW LONG IN THE LEGS IT WAS.  BEING 5' 9" (MYSELF) I ALWAYS FIND TROUSER LEGS TOO SHORT.  THE GARMENT IS INDEED VERY BEAUTIFUL AND FITTED PERFECTLY, VERY FLATTERING AS I AM A SIZE 16.  BUT AFTER ONLY WEARING THE GARMENT ONCE. THE INNER LINING FRAYED FROM UNDER THE ARMS ON BOTH SIDES, ALSO IT CAME APART ON THE OUTER LAYER ON THE TOP SHOULDER SEAM.  FOR SUCH AN EXPENSIVE GARMENT I WAS EXTREMELY DISSAPOINTED IN THE SHODDY WORKMANSHIP OF THE GARMENT.  I SENT IT TO MY  MOTHER FOR HAND STITCH REPAIRS WHICH TOOK HER OVER 5 HOURS TO MAKE A REASONABLE JOB OF IT.  I DEFINITELY WOULD NOT RECOMMEND BUYING THIS GARMENT TO ANYONE I WAS VERY DISSAPOINTED INDEED - SO NOT WORTH THE VERY EXPENSIVE PRICE TAG!

Text:
I'm 47 and recently got into wearing tight, bright jeans and check shirts and I wanted the most perfect pair of sporty shoes around.  These Converse Chucks are one of the coolest pair of sporty shoes ever!  The colour is heart-breakingly beautiful, the design is skilfully crafted and I especially love (about this pair) the words "All Star" on the heel is in matching green...on a lot of other Chucks you'll find the wording is in black.
Although this style of shoes are flat soled and so aren't the best for distance walking, this pair has a generously thick sole which although is flat, it is well easy to walk in.  I just wish that Converse would sell Chucks on their own website for a lower price...they don't! This is a shame but nothing to do with this pair of shoes.
It gives my heart a turbocharge when I'm walking in town wearing these and I see all the females (especially teens!) look towards me and smile in disbelief...yahoo! :-)
Anyone who wants a pair of cool, trendy, comfortable, sporty shoes should definitely check out these Chucks.
Title: Cool Chucks

I'm thinking of going to a tailor and just having all the buttons taken off and put back on properly for next winter.
Title: Faulty buttons and general poor quality

Text: I ordered this jumper as a gift, and eagerly awaited delivery of the item. After 5 days, the tracking information said that the item had still not been received in the UK - and as we were rapidly approaching my friend's birthday I rang the delivery company. The delivery company told me that the item wasn't in the UK, and eventually I managed to speak to someone at Zalando who advised me that they had no idea where the item was. I asked to cancel this order, but was told that this may happen, but may not. I have since received no confirmation that this item has been cancelled, or that a refund has been processed, or indeed any communication at all. Worst customer service I've ever experienced ever, and I will not be purchasing from this site again.
Title: Product never received, refund never confirmed

Text: I liked the design and functionality of these boots, but the sloppy chinese manufacturing has let them down.  The first pair I received had a defect which was hurting my leg, and had to return them.  The second pair were good.  A lot of hit and miss with chinese manufacturing which is known for producing a high % of faulty goods.  If I were the designer I would change to a better manufacturer, because the designs and ideas behind Anna Field are lovely but the manufacturing is poor.  The law price comes with a tag - might be faulty, be prepared to waste your time with returns.
Title: Good design and functional

Text: Decent sized sports bag but probably unsuitable for heavy sports gear - ideal for swimming gear/yoga etc.  Maybe just big enough for an overnight stay but again if you are packing hair dryers etc in there it may be cause the seams to rip.  Quite flimsy material and the white handle may get quite discoloured through continuous use - not sure if its washable and the red dye could run into it.  Overpriced for what it is but its likely to be the name/logo you are paying for.  On the upside, it is quite stylish and really useful for lighter gym gear.

Text: Just taken delivery of this jacket. Typical Gant high quality..  Perfect to wear with jeans raising the look from extreme casual to smart casual.  Red lining, hood, and Gant logo.  I can see this being a good 'travelling' jacket; airline etc as well as ideal golf gear to cut out those biting winds.  Not tested for waterproof as yet but looks as if it will keep out a heavy shower.  I also own a mid length Gant jacket and this comes up a little smaller around the chest than the 'mid length' version.  Seems same length as the mid length, maybe an inch shorter.  Interior marking reads 'Wind Jacket'.  Lightweight with velcro cuffs.  Hood in collar is hardly noticeable and certainly not bulky, though I doubt I will ever use the hood as not sure about the red colour.  Overall: Very happy with my purchase.
Title: Quality

Text:
These shoes are amazing! If  you are a massive fan of JC like me, you'll know they are practically sold out everywhere in the UK at the moment, so finding these in stock here made my day! They arrived in the usual lovely JC box, perfect quality and obviously well made.
I love them - a perfect boot as they have the fashionable 'cut-out' style and are also not very high, so really comfortable to walk in.
I will be wearing mine with socks and tights for now and then with dresses in summer because I imagine them to be cool enough with the cut-out style. Defiantly a must-have boot for all year round!
Also the postage was really quick (they arrived in 2 days after dispatch) which was great. Thanks Zalando!

Text: Really comfortable. Very well cut and styled around the stomach and hips, nice, soft material. My only gripes are that the waistband could have been more attractive and made of better quality material - it looks ungiving, but surprisingly, it isn't and I think the rise could be longer. Best worn above the hips. Not worth upsizing, as there is masses of material in the legs. On the whole, very good value for money, as they are well styled and super comfortable. Oh, and fine as PJ/Lounge trousers, (there seems to be some confusion in the descriptions). I don't think they would make good tracksuit bottoms!

Text: I am normally a size 7 standard fit.   This is a lovely shoe but heeding the note concerning tight fitting I took a size 7.5.   This was still too small and tight at the big toe.   Asics need to look at their sizing as having to move to a size 8 is too much.   the shoe size fits but the width is definitely restrictive.   You need a slim foot.
Title: very slim

Text:
The quality of this parka is excellent with a substantial waxed cotton exterior, a warm fleece lining and a large hood with a fur trim AND lining.  The parka is stylish with attention to detail (a sturdy zip plus fastenings on the front and a reflective trim on the back).  The A line cut (without a waisted cord) is perfect for my 'apple' shaped figure.  I am a size 14 and found the Large size was fine with sufficient room to add layers.  

The Product Information states the parka can be machine washed at 30 degrees however the parka's own care label advises Dry Cleaning only.  I contacted Zalando who advise following the Care label and plan to amend their on line information.
Title: PERFECT PARKA FOR WINTER!

Text: I've had one of these shirts for a while.  They're quite smart looking (don't need ironing) and very easy to wear - the roll-up and button-up sleeves are a nice idea.  It's a good shirt to wear in warmer weather, though can cling a little if the weather is very humid, and with long sleeves and a collar that can be turned up, it gives good sun protection.  The fabric has a slightly silky, slightly synthetic feel to it, but it's not unpleasant - it doesn't feel "Eeuuww - synthetic!"  It feels quite nice, really.  It looks well sewn and well finished - a quality product.

Text: My misfortune in life has been to have BIG  feet - I am a UK size 8, sometimes 8.5, or even 9 depepnding on label. As well I am quite tall so tend to prefer low heeled or flat shoes. I hardly ever manage to find a pair of shoes that I like that will fit, so was blown away when I saw these shoes. They are just the most beautiful shoes ever. Gorgeous autumnal shades of plum, green, and gold in a mix of textiles and finishings that raelly give these a very classy look. And the mid-height heel was a real deal breaker. More expensive than I'd usually spend on a pair of shoes, but hey, it'snot every day that a girl finds her dream shoes. So was thrilled to see them available in my size, and waited happily for them to arrive, which they did, only 3 days after husband had meekly handed over his credit card.  Dreams instantly dashed. Deflation of the soul. These are a EU size 8, i.e. a 41, which means they are in effect a UK size 7 and therefore about as useful to me as a chocolate kettle. So I am returning, reluctantly. I am aware that the label does make these in a EU size 9, the equivalent of UK, size 8, but they were ALL SOLD OUT!!!!!!!!!!! Please manufacturers, be aware that there are a lot of us women with larger than average feet and a) make shoes in larger sizes, and b)make more of them. I am gutted to have had to return these.
Title: Most beautiful shoes ever...shame about the sizing..

Text: These are very special shoes. The colours in the picture are not quite true – the green is more of a bottle green, not khaki, and the front section is black – but no worse for that. The lime green stripe and pewter-coloured  bindings make them very unusual. I’m an old-fashioned UK size 3, but the 2.5 was a perfect fit. Definitely recommend – I’m hoping to keep these for many years to come.

Text: This cardigan is a lovely colour and it is a nice cardigan, but the picture makes the material look a lot thicker than it is. Unfortunately, because the material isn't very strong and it is a zip up rather than a button up, when fully zipped up, the front has a ripple effect along the zip line. So if you are curvy like me, the zip doesn't lie flat on your tummy holding you in, it has a camel hump effect that made me look pregnant ... not very flattering. Such a shame as I feel in love with this online.

Text:
I was worried about the sizing chart with this jacket as I'm a size 10, but wasn't sure whether to order a small or medium.  I sent for the latter ... it fits perfectly.
I have worn the jacket on a few occasions so far, and it is pretty warm ... the test coming up is "watching the grandson's football match" ... watch this space.
The jacket is VERY light in weight, and a cosy fit. ... I can easily add a layer under, and a layer over it. when the really cold weather comes along.
This is the most expensive jacket  I've ever bought, but I am trusting that it will prove worth every pound.

Text: I am totally please with the top - it is beautiful.  However, the delivery of the item was a bit of a disaster.  The delivery company delivered to the wrong address, claiming that they had got a signature on a named date/time (which they clearly had NOT from me).  5 days passed, then someone put the package through my door late at night.  I guess I was lucky and had an honest neighbour.  What is irritating in particular is that Zalando never responded to any of my emails regarding this problem.  Sadly I won't order from the company again because of this.  Let the buyer beware!

Text:
I bought these to help keep me warm during the winter months of the mile long walk/jog to my local gym & I keep them on during weight training sessions.
I don't live in an especially warm climate & it rains quite a lot here, so these are just the job for keeping me warm & dry during light showers.
They dry out pretty fast so I'm happy to work up a lite sweat when jogging to the gym as a pre-workout warm up.
My ideal pant size are small waist with a short leg (I'm 5' 7" in overall hight) and the ones I had to order were a 'regular' length leg, so I've had to ask my awesome mum to reduce the leg length by a couple of inches.
Aside from that very minor inconvenience, they look great, are of the very high quality I've come to expect from Reebok & I couldn't be happier with them.
Title: Best tracksuit pants I've ever owned!

Text:
Warm and practical coat, true to size and is long enough to cover the bum which majority of coats for some reason don't do, no idea why. There is just the right amount of padding so the coat is warm and equally the child can run around and be active. Some coats feel like you are wearing an overstuffed duvet.
The colours are reasonably bright and pattern is busy not to show every little speck of dirt. 
The only slight complain is the absence of poppers to keep the zip concealed but as many children don't like to do up the poppers anyway it is not a big deal.

Text: I was tentative about ordering suede because I live in a wet place, but these are sumptuous and lovely. Just the right amount of softness and edge. A little suede protector spray and my fears are put to bed. For me, they are just the right amount of slouch versus height. Not so baggy on top as to give that "Robin Hood" look like some over the knee boots do, but not so tight that you can't fit your skinnies underneath with ease. A perfect way to add interest to a simple look. Love.

'Do you know your boots match your jacket ' ? she said..I replied' Yes ...and you are very colour co-ordinated too' she was wearing a lot of pink... 'Thanks' she said...and then added..."Oh, your earrings are green too' ...I hadn't noticed... So thanks for providing me with those lovely green boots

The tone of the colour is burgundy towards brown. I am a size 5 and they fit great giving space for thick socks if I want, but they don't feel too big with normal socks.

Text:
These boots are made of  superior quality leathers, are well-constructed with plenty of calf width and with a warm fleece lining right down to toes and at £44 sale price are a snip - so overall I would not hesitate to recommend them.
However I have taken 1 star off for the following reason.
Because there is a substantial fleece lining the actual foot room is reduced so instead of my usual size I returned the original rather tight fitting boots for a larger size and would recommend anyone else does the same.
But with Zalando's free returns and ease of leaving the parcel at my local newsagent (Hermes agent) sending the boots back couldn't be easier!

Text:
If you're looking for a very small bag to carry the bare essentials, such as a small purse and mobile phone, this could be just the ticket for you, but measure them carefully to ensure they'll fit! Allow a little more width and a little less height than stated dimensions due to the way the bag sits (maybe allow 1/2 inch less/more?): it really is VERY small!
It's smart yet casual, the zips are nice and chunky and fitted the right way round if you carry on your right shoulder (most bags zips seem 'backwards' to me :P).
The handle has a nice long drop length.
Quality was nice, although the stopper on the zipper needs to be moved along so that it sits atop the bag and not within it, to avoid possible zip problems in time.
Overall a very nice little bag for carrying the bare essentials. 
Perhaps a tad costly for it's size, but with the sale price, plenty reasonable enough to treat yourself!!
I returned and bought a bag that was a couple of inches taller but I would recommend this one to others: just check that whatever you intend to carry will easily fit inside it, aloowing the adjustment I suggested above - last thing you want is to be struggling to squeeze your purse in!
Title: Overall, a nice and very little bag.

I am 5'9'' and 155lbs and usually wear a medium but this shirt fits loose so I opted for a small and the fit is perfect. One minor issue I have is the colour of the shirt is black and not grey as shown in the photograph.

Text: These shoes may be described as "watersport shoes" but they are also great for walking off-road in hot, dusty/gritty countries such as Malta. The sieve meshing is excellent for keeping grit out of the shoe, the ventilation is excellent, the adjustability is nearly perfect (I'm not sure like the "lacing" system as much as real laces but the heel adjustment is super!) and the sole is robust enough for quite punishing scrambling. I haven't had a chance to give them a real workout yet - hence the 4 stars rather than 5.
Title: The North Face SIEVE IV - Watersports shoes - grey

Text: These tops are lovely. I wanted long line, good shape, no ribbing, long (decent length) sleeved tops with nice high ish neckline, not v neck but not scoop but not really high crew!! Not too fussy then! I am totally fussy with clothes! These tops ticked all the criteria! Good quality material with stretch, good length long sleeves, nice oblong neck line, good colours (navy and grey). I have only just washed them this weekend so will check they washed ok ( with no shrinkage) they look alright as they are drying. The only thing I would criticise is the lace seam is a little weak and may cause a problem as it is where you sit and stretch with movement. I had to reinforce one seam a little already with thread as it was a little undone when it arrived in the post. I think as long as you are a little careful and aware of this they will be fine. Highly recommend.
Title: Lovely! Just what I was after!

Text:
I ordered a size 12 as I'm a standard size 12. The jeans said size 38 continental size. In the UK 38 is a size 10 and 40 is a 12. So the jeans did not fit me.
I printed off a returns label, took the parcel to my nearest Hermes drop off place only to be told the bar code was wrong. I rang Zalando and arranged for a pick up at my house tomorrow sometime in the morning. So now on one of my two days off work I have to wait in for that. This is too much trouble to get a pair of trousers. Will not bother ordering from Zalando again.

Text: I received the parcel 2 days after I ordered the dress. I opened the box and I saw a lovely dress, exactly as described. I was very excited the dress fit just perfect! Very disappointed when realised that the threading on one side was that loose that beads were coming off! I thought that was unacceptable for a dress that costs 130 pounds! There was no other size 8 dress in stock so sending it back and ordering another one was not an option. I would have definitely returned it and ask for a refund if I had the time to look for a different dress, but I had a wedding coming up and not enough time. I took it to the tailors to fix it for a reasonable price (keep in mind that some of the beads were already missing when I opened the box so it never looked even but they were so small that nobody would notice). I don't think it takes so much to be sure that the threads are as the should on a dress you sell for 130 pounds. I really doubt I would recommend it to anybody which is a shame, cause the dress -apart from that problem- is just beautiful!
Title: Lovely dress, poor sewing!

Text: I love these boots, they are comfortable.  However only a couple of weeks of buying them I  discovered for the first time when it rained that the left boot seemed to be letting in water because my sock was saoking wet when I reached my destination.  On inspection there was no obvious sign of where the water had got in from. I reported this immediately to Zalando on Friday 5th Dec they acknowledged receipt of my complaint several hours later and requested that I take photographs of the product and email to them.  I complied with their instructions within 48.  I also asked if I should return the product?  5 days on Zalando  not even had the courtesy of acknowledging receipt of my emails let alone let me know what they intend to do about the faulty product. I have been ordering foot wear from Zalando for a number of years now and this is my very first experience of havong to make a complaint and I must say, I am extremely disappointed with this apparent poor customer service.  It is annoying when companies are very quick to sell you a product but appear disinterested when the customer seeks redress when something is wrong with teh product!!
Title: Poor Customer Service

Text: I ordered this product on 16 December for my 9 year olds Christmas. I have chased it by phone calls and emails only to be advised today 31 December that it is being returned by Hermes to Zalando and I will not receive the goods! My visa was debited on 16 December for £35 and was also advised today that it can take up yo 14 days for my account to be credited. Not only do I have one very upset son but also have to wait a month for a refund. Then to add salt to the wound I get this survey asking to review the goods!  The person I spoke to was very understanding but this does not make it any easier to tell my son he will not be getting his christmas present! Very very disappointed.
Title: Very very disappointed

I was abit apprehensive as to what size to get, but 6 1/2 is perfect. They don't rub or make my feet hurt and havin got a long pair of leather boots, I know they will loosen with time.

Going to save for another style.
